desc: Alaska Sales Increase, LLC. is currently seeking four telesales / telemarketing persons for our Sales Rep Team. We are an Anchorage based Digital Marketing Agency looking for people with telephone and cold call experience. This is a remote work from home position; however, it will require regular weekly meetings and daily reports of progress and detailed prospective client reports. The services we provide are Facebook Advertising, Instagram Advertising,  Social Media Management, Google PPC Campaigns, SEO, Email Marketing, and others.Our company is comprised of some of the best Digital Marketing Specialists in the business enabling us to provide you with leverageable results when making your sales calls even though our actual company is new. Our company offers outsourced social media management with a focus on Facebook Advertising Campaigns. To be frank, our pricing is higher than the typical digital marketing agency only because the results we produce for our clients are focused primarily on the most important metric: sales.With our continued focus on providing revenue driving solutions to local small & mid-sized dental and chiropractic clinics, your job becomes simple. Contact local dental/chiropractic clinic owners and offer them the proper digital marketing package (based on their current revenue and their revenue goals) to increase their sales.  We have developed a sales system based on the structure of other successful digital marketing agencies. We offer you a great commission structure that pays out large upfront commissions. The commission structure will be available upon request.We are looking for a motivated individual with a strong network of potential business owners that may need these digital marketing services. The position would entail reaching out to prospective clients in an effort to set up sales/consultation meetings to close them as a client of our services. Cold calling and web/marketing sales experience preferred. Our ideal candidate is a highly motivated, detail-oriented person who is able to work with a team with excellent follow through. Excellent communication skills are required. If you would like to join a young, new, exciting company with unlimited opportunity for growth, contact us immediately.We offer cutting edge services with a proven track record. The earning potential for this position is limited only by your ability to sell. Lead procurement and all sales methods are also supplied.  It would also be helpful to have experience in sales of anything in the digital marketing space.
title: Appointment Setter For Digital Marketing Agency
